attributes.action: GIVE THE PEOPLE OF U.K. A REFERENDUM ON IF WE WANT TO LEAVE THE E.U.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BEING A MEMBER OF THE E.U. HAS DESTROYED THIS COUNTRY, TAKING POWER AWAY FROM THE VOTERS OF THE U.K. GIVING IT TO UNELECTED PEOPLE IN BRUSSELS. WE NEED AN OPEN AND HONEST DEBATE ON MEMBERSHIP OF BEING IN THE E.U. A REFERENDUM WILL GIVE THE PEOPLE OF THE U.K. A DEMORCRATIC CHOICE TO STAY OR LEAVE THE E.U.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/eumembership/

Also, if you decide to resubmit, please do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
